articles.title: Europe's medicine regulator eyes rolling review for Merck's COVID-19 pill | ANC - ANC 24/7
articles.description: Rundown: The European Medicines Agency is eyeing to launch a rolling review of Merck's experimental COVID-19 pill in the coming days.For more ANC Interviews,...
